OOC: Lol! So true! Now who'll be the first for a Targetmaster? Or
worse, a =
Powermaster!

BIC: 

As soon as Scorponok resurfaced, Deadfur received a re=
port about it
from one of the Ground crew.

Deadfur: Alright, Remus. You wa=
nt your chance, there it is! Go! [To
the command center] Can anybody get me=
 Lord Razorwing?

But at the same time, the Airtankers arrived in visibilit=
y range of
the city. The fliers, seeing the newcomers, moved in to intercep=
t, but
the attackers knew their stuff. Gunrain quickly dodged between the
f=
liers and took out a lot of the defenders with his multiple guns,
while Sky=
sword did not even bother with dodging, rather preferring to
ram and slice =
his opponents with his sharp wings. Bombtube took to the
air, immediately a=
ttracting attention, but Lock-on gave him some cover
with her saturation mi=
ssiles. Because of that, he managed to bombard
the shields, weakening them =
dangerously.

Motherload, however, was still behind, not fast enough to eng=
age in
any kind of dogfight, but still armed enough to be left alone for th=
e
moment.

Motherload: Is this it, My Lord? Are these all the city's defens=
es?
Why did you even bother us? I was going to trick them all and win the
j=
ackpot this time!

Jotunn: Silence, Motherload. This is only the prelude. Y=
ou will see
the reason I brought you here soon if Razorwing doesn't do what=
's
right for everyone.

He pressed a button and opened a channel to Relay's=
 command center.

Jotunn: Lord Razorwing, this is your last opportunity. Yo=
u still have
a chance to spare millions of civilians and to keep your valia=
nt
soldiers online. Surrender and we will not harm them.
